title: Addis Business Directory
description: A comprehensive business directory application for Addis Ababa, featuring location-based search, business profiles, and user reviews.
longDescription: A comprehensive business directory application for Addis Ababa, helping residents and visitors discover local businesses through location-based search, detailed profiles, and user reviews.
overview: The Addis Business Directory is a mobile-first application that connects users with thousands of businesses across Addis Ababa. Designed for both residents and tourists, the platform provides detailed information about local establishments, from restaurants and hotels to service providers and retail shops.
challenges: Collecting accurate business data in an environment with limited digital records
Addressing inconsistent addressing systems across different parts of the city
Creating an intuitive interface that works across various device capabilities
Building a platform that functions well in areas with intermittent connectivity

solutions.title: Data Collection
solutions.description: Combined field research, business partnerships, and user contributions to build a comprehensive database

solutions.title: Advanced Mapping
solutions.description: Implemented a flexible location system with multiple reference points and visual mapping

solutions.title: Progressive Web App
solutions.description: Created a responsive interface that adapts to different devices while providing offline functionality

solutions.title: Verified Reviews
solutions.description: Implemented a trusted review system with verification to ensure quality feedback

features.title: Smart Search
features.description: Powerful search functionality with filters for category, location, ratings, and operating hours, with support for Amharic and English queries.

features.title: Interactive Mapping
features.description: Visual map exploration with clustered markers, directions, and proximity-based recommendations for easy navigation around the city.

features.title: Detailed Business Profiles
features.description: Comprehensive listings including contact information, services, hours, photos, menus or product catalogs, and verified user reviews.

features.title: Offline Access
features.description: Core functionality available offline, including saved businesses, maps for common areas, and the ability to queue reviews for later submission.

testimonials.name: Kebede Tadesse
testimonials.quote: The Addis Business Directory has transformed how customers find my restaurant. Since joining, we've seen a 30% increase in new customers, especially tourists who might never have discovered us otherwise.

testimonials.name: Sara Mekonnen
testimonials.quote: This app has become essential for navigating Addis. I use it almost daily to find new places, check business hours, and read reviews. The offline maps feature is especially helpful in areas with poor connection.
